subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Taylor Hall, Ryan Nugent-Hopkins, Jordan Eberle and Justin Schultz could be the answer to the Edmonton Oilers’ making the playoffs for the first time since 2006.
snippet: Taylor Hall, Ryan Nugent-Hopkins, Jordan Eberle and Justin Schultz could be the answer to the Edmonton Oilers’ making the playoffs for the first time since 2006.
